column5: Hey guys, every time that the software on this site gets upgraded something always seems to get lost. Is there any way to put a link back to the old photo libraries so that we don't have to re-post older stuff all over again?
Yes, I think we have that covered.
Roy, when I click on the gallery, my library of photos no longer shows up. Where is it located now?
Same place it always was. Try here: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...m&album=217
